data.name: XFilePreview
desc: FilePicker that support the preview of various file formats should implement this interface.

methods.name: getAvailableHeight
desc: The method returns the available height of the preview window even if the window is invisible or could not be created.
If a service implementation doesn't support a file preview 0 will be returned.

methods.name: getAvailableWidth
desc: The method returns the available width of the preview window even if the window is invisible or could not be created.
If a service implementation doesn't support a file preview 0 will be returned.

methods.name: getShowState
desc: Returns the current show state of the preview.
A value of FALSE if the preview window is invisible.

methods.name: getSupportedImageFormats
desc: The method returns all image formats that the preview supports.

methods.name: getTargetColorDepth
desc: The method returns the supported color depth of the target device.

methods.name: setImage
desc: If the preview is currently hidden the image will be ignored. An empty any will clear the preview window.

methods.name: setShowState
desc: Optionally sets the current show state of the preview.
It is possible that the preview implementation doesn't support hiding the preview.
A value of FALSE hides the preview window.
A value of FALSE if the operation fails for any reason or the preview implementation doesn't support hiding the preview.
